from odw.core.util.util import Util
from typing import Dict, Any
from datetime import datetime
import json

source_folder = input_arguments.get("source_folder", None)
source_frequency_folder = input_arguments.get("source_frequency_folder", None)
date_folder = input_arguments.get("date_folder")

storage_account = Util.get_storage_account()
storage_account_name = storage_account.split(".")[0]
raw_container = "odw-raw"

if date_folder == "":
    date_folder = datetime.now().date()
else:
    date_folder = datetime.strptime(date_folder, "%Y-%m-%d")

date_folder_str = date_folder.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
source_folder_path = source_folder if not source_frequency_folder else f"{source_folder}/{source_frequency_folder}"
source_path = f"abfss://{raw_container}@{storage_account}{source_folder_path}/{date_folder_str}"
files = mssparkutils.fs.ls(source_path)


source_data = {
    file.name: {
        "storage_kind": "ADLSG2-File",
        "storage_name": storage_account_name,
        "container_name": raw_container,
        "blob_path": f"{source_folder_path}/{date_folder_str}/{file.name}",
        "file_format": file.name.split(".")[-1]
    }
    for file in files
